name: Hakugyokurou No. 08~ Neo Super-Express
description:
Play as Maribel as she explores with Renko, and as Yukari as she comes to terms with entering a new relationship.

The way you spend the limited resources, interact, & Dialogue options will gather points towards each character, and certain interactions will favor another character more.

Gameplay is around 10-20 minutes for all endings.
This game was made as part of the Touhou Project Pride Game Jam.

There are 4 endings.

Team: 
SFX & BGM: Lowlands Blossom
Art, Development: Copper Reverie
